entry.title: Catgirls Can Have A Little Theft, As A Treat
entry.summary:
Author: atomicpanda

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 51,505Chapters: 32/?Kudos: 238

Summary: Waking up as a tween catgirl in the DCU, a self insert into Gotham experiences the thrills of the masked nightlife, fails to combat her new urge to steal, and fails to combat her new feline instincts, all while working towards her goal of bringing good music to a Deathworld. Armed with the power of adorableness and also a deck of cards that hold a unique path to Power, Allison "AlleyKat" Kyle may not shake the world, but she sure as heck is going to knock it off the ledge.

entry.title: And That We Call Being
entry.summary:
Author: oldrockformations

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,807Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 147

Summary: “I’m Sorry?” If Tim's… friend (would Tim get shot if he were to call Jason his brother?) is feeling particularly gregarious, they might chat about light subjects—the latest trafficking ring Jason's brought down, the newest security measures government agencies have implemented to try and keep Tim out, whatever shenanigans their assorted siblings and sibling-adjacent friends are getting into. But they've always avoided any conversation topics that might be considered heavier. Namely: feelings. It's been a perfectly normal Tuesday morning so far. They haven't exchanged any words today, other than a dry greeting when Tim sat down half-an-hour ago. There's no way they're about to have this conversation right here, right now. "Do you ever think about being a woman?"   Or Jason comes to terms with the idea that he might be a woman, and realizes how loved she is in the process Or Orjesus christ can u imagine the sociopolitical impacts of the red hood coming out as trans

Summary: Hal.exe stopped working. This child, this Sparrow, was THE Sparrow? Like the Champion of Predator, Wielder of Violet Light, Paragon of Love, Sparrow? The Star Sapphire with ‘rings for eyes’ that Kilowog, Green Lantern 1-9-8-6, was always going on and on about? The individual Carol, Star Sapphire 1-9-6-2, was always saying was a 'stain’ against the Zamaron’s Star Sapphires Corps?But they were just an itty bitty little baby.“You’re joking right” he teased assuming this was just Sinestro trying his hand at humor “please tell me your joking. Surely a 6 year old human child isn’t THE Sparrow”“You are correct” Sinestro agreed flatly a small smile forming upon his face as Hal relaxed at his response “a 6 year old human child is not THE Sparrow”“Oh thank-“ Hal started only to get cut off as Sinestro finished his thoughts.“It is my understanding that the child is only 4 and a half”ORTim Drake becomes a Star Sapphire shortly after watching the Flying Graysons fall. entry.title: B'traxia's Hive King Mating Guide for the Recently Transformed!
entry.summary:
Author: Tinerian

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,984Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 69

Summary: The book's cover features a lavish illustration of an alien with a roughly 'centaur' configuration of limbs. It's got a set of massive spikes for front legs that look great for digging and cleaving people in two, and a pair of cat like, pawed digidigrades for back legs. The spine and joints are armor plated, while the soft belly is lined with octopus arms of wildly varying sizes. The alien is also proudly presenting his three MASSIVE PHALLUSES for the audience. Tim sputters and laughs, opening the book up and flipping through it lazily. The quality is ridiculously good overall. It's hand bound, full color, lavishly illustrated with diagrams and charts and cultural notes and- it's honestly hilariously Jason in nature now that he thinks about it. Like, of course, Jason with his snobby love of all things hand crafted would masturbate to niche fetish shit in a weird format full of way too much worldbuilding. It's probably bespoke too; Tim would lay good money that Jason commissioned the artist himself. Tim flips back to the first page and starts reading.
